item.title: Post Malone
item.description: Austin Richard Post, known professionally as Post Malone, is an American rapper, singer, songwriter, and record producer. He has gained acclaim for blending musical genres including hip hop, pop, trap, and rock, his introspective songwriting, and his laconic vocal style. Born in Syracuse, New York and raised in Grapevine, Texas, Post first attained recognition in 2015 following the release of his debut single 'White Iverson', which peaked in the top 20 on the US Billboard Hot 100. He subsequently earned a recording contract with Republic Records.
